title: AcknowledgementMsgWhoAmI
description:
A custom acknowledgement type. The success type `T` depends on the PacketMsg variant.

This could be refactored to use [StdAck] at some point. However, it has a different success variant name ("ok" vs. "result") and a JSON payload instead of a binary payload.

[StdAck]: https://github.com/CosmWasm/cosmwasm/issues/1512

WhoAmIResponse.description: This is the success response we send on ack for PacketMsg::WhoAmI. Return the caller's account address on the remote chain
